special_abilities.name: Special Equipment.
descriptions: Talis has +1 scale mail and a wand of winter.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
descriptions: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon (spear)
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon (spear)

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, mass healing word, sending
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, mass healing word, sending

descriptions.raw: * 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement

special_abilities.name: Winter Strike (3/Day).
descriptions: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Spear.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
